entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 3:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
